name: OPP Group SPRL
goal: A business information service focused on providing EU policy monitoring, research, and event services.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Files (both legislative and non-legislative) in energy, environment, climate change, trade, digital, transport, food & drink, internal market, health, research, and finance policy. Provide research and information services in other policy areas on demand.
